procedures: 1. Verify sentinel alerts and telemetry support intervention.
2. Convene guardian council for a signed decision (â‰¥2/3 quorum).
3. Execute the desired override via Safe transaction builder using the calldata below.
4. Broadcast status to mission control and validators immediately after execution.

overrides.label: Pause all core modules
overrides.description: Dispatch an immediate circuit breaker across job routing, staking, validation, dispute, and treasury flows.
prerequisites: Phase8 manager configured as Safe module
advisory: Confirm sentinel alerts justify halting all domains.
Notify mission control that queued jobs will stall until unpaused.

overrides.label: Restore core modules
overrides.description: Re-enable every module once the guardian council signs the remediation postmortem.
prerequisites: Phase8 manager configured as Safe module
advisory: Coordinate with validator registry to re-seed quorum where needed.
